article_title: Israeli strikes heaviest so far, say residents of south Gaza city
sentence: Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  at  least  193  people  have  been  killed  in  the  latest  wave  of  Israeli  attacks.

article_title: Israeli strikes heaviest so far, say residents of south Gaza city
sentence: On  Friday,  the  Israel  Defense  Forces  (IDF)  resumed  its  offensive  against  Hamas  in  Gaza,  launched  in  response  to  the  7  October  attacks  in  Israel  which  killed  around  1,200  people.

article_title: Israeli strikes heaviest so far, say residents of south Gaza city
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  the  number  of  people  killed  in  Gaza  has  now  exceeded  15,200  people.
